Articles.Content: This is just a minor thing; in the Science tab, the descriptions of the four science instruments spell "warranty" incorrectly. It's not a priority thing, but my OCD kicked in when I noticed it.
I never saw this either. I'd rather I didn't, it's bugging me too, now.

"Warrenty void".

Directly from the .cfg of the thermometer. Hadn't noticed it either.
I noticed this about a month ago and I almost emailed Squad about it... Oh OCD, aren't you a fun thing sometimes
The cool thing is that this is a bug that we users can fix ourselves, all you have to do is edit the .cfg files.

The cool thing is that this is a bug that we users can fix ourselves, all you have to do is edit the .cfg files.

But if you do that, does your game still count as being stock?
